name: Rummy 2019 - Enjoy fun with friends
description:
Rummy 2019 is a very interesting card game whose goal is to put all the cards into suits. To achieve this, you must meet the following requirements:

*Run at least 2 times;
*One of the players has at least 4 cards;
*One without a joker

If you combine all the cards into suits, the game will detect that and you will be the winner of the round. If someone wins before you, you can run your card to get the lowest score.

Points will be counted at the end of the round. And when someone reaches 400 points, the player with less points wins the game.

Rummy 2019 is a 4-player card game combining elements such as Rummy, Rummy 500, Indian Rummy, board games and mahjong. It is also a puzzle game just like Klondike, solitaire, spiders or free cell cards. In some regions, our game is also called Rummicub or Rummykub.
